name: Easter Egg (Bepary Games)
description:
Bepary Games

Ester Egg

Game information/description

Throw some easter eggs at those ugly aligators, they never got one. Be kind and evil at the same time.

Controls

  • Left click to throw.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

Some of the resources in this game are from other publishers. This game is for educational purposese only.
